00034 #ifndef _PLT_XBOX360_H_
00035 #define _PLT_XBOX360_H_
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |   includes
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 #include "PltMediaRenderer.h"
00041 
00042 class PLT_Xbox360 : public PLT_MediaRenderer
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     PLT_Xbox360(const char*  uuid        = NULL, 
00046                 unsigned int port        = 0,
00047                 bool         port_rebind = false);
00048 
00049 protected:
00050     // PLT_DeviceHost methods
00051     virtual NPT_Result SetupServices();
00052     virtual NPT_Result SetupIcons();
00053     virtual NPT_Result InitServiceURLs(PLT_Service* service, const char* service_name);
00054     
00055     virtual NPT_Result Announce(PLT_DeviceData*  device, 
00056                                 NPT_HttpRequest& request, 
00057                                 NPT_UdpSocket&   socket, 
00058                                 bool             byebye);
00059 
00060     // PLT_DeviceData methods
00061     virtual NPT_Result GetDescription(NPT_String& desc) { return PLT_MediaRenderer::GetDescription(desc); }
00062     virtual NPT_Result GetDescription(NPT_XmlElementNode*  parent, 
00063                                       NPT_XmlElementNode** device = NULL);
00064 
00065 protected:
00066     virtual ~PLT_Xbox360();
00067 
00068     virtual NPT_Result AnnouncePresence(NPT_UdpSocket& socket, 
00069                                         const char*    serial_number);
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif /* _PLT_XBOX360_H_ */
